channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Intercampus for CMTV, 29 August–4 September 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • LIVRE (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Iniciativa Liberal (RE): 1–2 seats
  • Aliança Democrática (EPP): 6–8 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 6–9 seats
  • Chega (PfE): 3–4 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Intercampus for CMTV, 29 August–4 September 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Intercampus for CMTV, 29 August–4 September 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 4.6–8.5%
  • LIVRE (Greens/EFA): 1.9–4.7%
  • Iniciativa Liberal (RE): 6.3–10.8%
  • Aliança Democrática (EPP): 26.0–33.2%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 27.9–35.3%
  • Chega (PfE): 12.1–17.8%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 2.4–5.5%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 0.7–2.6%
